channel.title: Agile on Guido Portalanza's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Agile on Guido Portalanza's Blog

item.title: Kanban Adoption Guide for Scrum Teams
item.description: I am a strong supporter of Kanban, even more than I am of Scrum, though I know the latter is more popular.

item.title: Agile Principles Explained
item.description: This post is about how I understand two of the twelve principles of Agile software development underneath The Agile Manifesto.
